text: Oprea Păunescu (born 6 July 1936) is a Romanian rower. He competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics in Tokyo with the men's coxed pair where they came tenth. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Romania Category:Rowers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Bucharest Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for Romania Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Oprea Păunescu
